<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>false</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>false</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>sn_hr_core_profile</collection>
        <condition/>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition table="sn_hr_core_profile">employee_numberISNOTEMPTY^sourceISNOTEMPTY^personal_emailVALCHANGES^ORmobile_phoneVALCHANGES^ORwork_mobileVALCHANGES^ORhome_phoneVALCHANGES^ORwork_phoneVALCHANGES^ORcountryVALCHANGES^ORcityVALCHANGES^ORzipVALCHANGES^ORstateVALCHANGES^ORaddressVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="employee_number" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="source" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="personal_email" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="mobile_phone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="work_mobile" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="home_phone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="work_phone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="country" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="city" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="zip" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/>
            <item endquery="false" field="address" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/>
            <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/>
        </filter_condition>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Push to Ext Interface on Contact Change</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var hrIntHelper = new HRIntegrationsHelper();
	if(hrIntHelper.isPushEnabled(current.source.toString()) == "false"){
		gs.info("Push not enable, Ignore");
		return;
	}
	
	if(current.transaction_log.changes()){
		gs.info("Update from Sync, So Ignore Pushing");
		return;
	}
	
	var profile = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_core_profile");
	
	if(profile.get(current.sys_id) && !profile.source.nil()){
		var mapping = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_integrations_service_mapping");
		mapping.addActiveQuery();
		//Query on Maintain Contact Information outbound service to get the service mapping
		mapping.addQuery("hr_integration_outbound_service", hrIntegrations.MAINTAIN_CONTACT_INFORMATION_SERVICE_ID);
		mapping.query();
		if(mapping.next()){
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_integrations_external_interface');
			//check if the entry already exists
			gr.addQuery("hr_integration_service_mapping", mapping.getValue("sys_id"));
			gr.addQuery("source_table_sys_id", profile.sys_id);
			gr.addQuery("status","pending");
			gr.query();
			if(!gr.next()){
				gr.initialize();
				gr.setValue("source_table_name", "sn_hr_core_profile");
				gr.setValue("source_table_sys_id", profile.sys_id);
				gr.setValue("process_type", "asynchronous");
				gr.setValue("status", "pending");
				gr.setValue("hr_integration_service_mapping",mapping.getValue("sys_id"));
				gr.insert();
				gs.info("Posted the Maintain Contact Information event to external interface Profile "  +  profile.sys_id);
			}
		}else{
			gs.error("Mapping not found for Maintain Contact Information " + hrIntegrations.MAINTAIN_CONTACT_INFORMATION_SERVICE_ID );
		}
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-03-03 21:23:24</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path>
        <sys_id>22ab8f919f1132003be01050a57fcfd6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Push to Ext Interface on Contact Change</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Integrations" source="sn_hr_integrations">aaa655c19f0322003be01050a57fcf65</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Integrations">aaa655c19f0322003be01050a57fcf65</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_22ab8f919f1132003be01050a57fcfd6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-07-24 19:21:32</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>async</when>
    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=22ab8f919f1132003be01050a57fcfd6"/>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Push to Ext Interface on Contact Change
